name: Vonage Reverse Voice Verify
description: Reverse Voice Verify is an inverted way to verify OTP, verifying the OTP code using DTMF from a code visually displayed on the application/web page instead of getting the code via SMS or Voice as with Vonage Verify.

PRIVATE_KEY.description: Vonage (Nexmo) Voice Application Private Key content

VOICE_HOST.description: Publicly accessible host of this application. Example: https://reverse-voice-verify.herokuapp.com

VOICE_LVN.description: Long Virtual Number (LVN) to be used to make the calls

PUSHER_APP_ID.description: Pusher App ID (Get from Pusher Dashboard)

TOTP_SECRET.description: A secret key to generate TOTP
